title: The Exorcist
content:
Alright, so I know I had it at ONE point but cannot for the life of me remember what it was so... anyone know what was the typeface used for The Exorcist (looks like the same was used for the first print of the novel and the film)

[http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/5/51/Blatty\_Exorcist.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140112120711/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/5/51/Blatty_Exorcist.jpg "http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/5/51/Blatty\_Exorcist.jpg")  
 [http://static.guim.co.uk/sys-images/Film/Pix/pictures/2008/08/25/exorcis...](http://web.archive.org/web/20140112120711/http:/static.guim.co.uk/sys-images/Film/Pix/pictures/2008/08/25/exorcist_posterbig.jpg "http://static.guim.co.uk/sys-images/Film/Pix/pictures/2008/08/25/exorcist\_posterbig.jpg")
author: adamschoales

comments.content:
Looked like Flange to me. But the devil is in the details. You'll have to exorcise the right leg of the R a little.  
\>;-) Andreas
